landing.description: Easy to use and aesthetically pleasing email client, coming soon!

vision.title: Reading mail should be enjoyable
text: What do you do when you're browsing through your social media apps like Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, Reddit, etc.? You browse content.
Reading your mails should be about reading and enjoying the content that they provide, not the hassle that they currently are.

features.less: Less buzz, enjoy your content as it should be experienced.
features.reinvent: Doesn't try to reinvent the wheel but just tries to improve the experience of what an email client should be.
features.gather: Gather all your mail from all your accounts in one place.
features.storage: Everything is stored on your device by default, so no outside security leaks.
features.quiet: Quiet by default, you decide which emails you get notified about.
